title: 'Waste of money
column5: The product quality is terrible and pathetic... never have I ever ordered something like this. It has only been 2 months and this is its condition not only that even the sole is pathetic, it slips a lot even in places that are not very slippery. Don't trust other reviews unless money grows in your garden

title: 'Worst Sizing Ever'
body: I am size 3/4 (20 to 22cm). Their size 4 DID NOT fit me and was too huge (looked like a size 7 or 8). The slipper quality is best called 'average', does not look durable, feels durable.... Feels like foam that can break off in no time.
